duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute a MIL STD 882E-based system safety program and associated processes.
Develop and implement system safety programs on complex system development contracts.
Assess system risks to personnel, equipment, and/or environment through various hazard analysis and fault tree analysis.
Participate in engineering meetings, program reviews, and proposal preparation.
Mentor and coach the work of others as assigned.
Support, communicate, reinforce, and defend the mission, values, and culture of the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in engineering or related technical field with a minimum of 10 years of experience (Master's preferred).
